title: Logging in Issues
body: This morning I woke up to play some league and got the good old fashion forever log-in screen. I have ran the program as an admin.... did a full dns flush.... reset my router twice... and repaired league through the repair button. I can connect to any other online program... access to the internet... everything else is working smooth. I double checked that League of Legends was allowed through both firewalls and nothing is blocking the program. I think I need some help any other suggestions?

replies.body:
Server issues, check around the forums.
A lot of us are having it.
Glad it is not just me.... I was extremely worried that something broke I will check back occasionally over the next couple of hours to keep myself updated thanks for the reply
I just got booted from a game not too long ago and haven't been able to reconnect either. Same issue of not being able to log in.
I have not tried for 30 minutes I will try now and let you know
Seems to still be frozen at log in server problems are not resolved yet... usually takes riot 4-5 hours to fix problems like this
